abstract: Among Democrats and Republicans alike, there is the sort of locker-room backbiting that occurs when Yankee and Red Sox seasons end in ignominy.
snippet: Among Democrats and Republicans alike, there is the sort of locker-room backbiting that occurs when Yankee and Red Sox seasons end in ignominy.

headline.main: In Washington, Everyone Seems Mad at Teammates
headline.print_headline: In Washington, Everyone Seems Mad at Teammates
